name: LangTweeTweet's Centipede
description:
Centipede but it's Langton's ant but it's generative music but it fits in two tweets.

Left/right move

Z/O shoots

Don't let them get past the bottom of the screen!

Each color is a different note, the effect works best when there is only one or two left alive.

Made for TweetTweetJam 5!
